episodes.title: How to Think Critically with Social Psychologist - Dr. Bo Bennett - #128
episodes.description: The Life of Dr. Bo Bennett: Entrepreneur, Author, and Social Psychologist He is a multi-faceted individual who has succeeded in many fields. Dr. Bennett shares his journey as a social psychologist, businessman, and author of more than twelve books. We discuss the entrepreneurial spirit that propelled him to pursue a PhD in social psychology and the journey leading to a $20 million company sale. Dr. Bennett reveals his triumphs while exploring critical thinking, cognitive biases, and logical fallacies, and the atheist point of view. 00:00 – Who Is Dr. Bo? 02:16 – Childhood to CEO 04:15 – Psychology Beckons 06:49 – Truth or Bias? 08:18 – Mind Traps Exposed 15:10 – Dot-Com Secrets 18:59 – Entrepreneur Advice 21:33 – Humanism’s Struggles 25:50 – Cults + Conspiracies 30:20 – Faith vs. Mental Health 32:06 – What Is Atheism? 34:59 – Should We Eat Meat? 38:24 – Lab-Meat Future? 41:01 – AI: Friend or Foe? 46:36 – Big Life Lessons 49:23 – Speed Round Finish
